metadata.title: CVE-2018-11802 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In Apache Solr, the cluster can be partitioned into multiple collections and only a subset of nodes actually host any given collection. However, if a node receives a request for a collection it does not host, it proxies the request to a relevant node and serves the request. Solr bypasses all authorization settings for such requests. This affects all Solr versions prior to 7.7 that use the default authorization mechanism of Solr (RuleBasedAuthorizationPlugin).

criterions.comment: lucene-solr package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
